trans-unit.source: Defines the delegate for the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Definisce il delegato per il <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles"> </xref> evento del <xref href="System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The RoleManagerEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Il delegato RoleManagerEventHandler è definito per l' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento della <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> class in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application as shown in the example for this topic.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere il <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento del <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>classe nel file Global. asax dell'applicazione ASP.NET, come illustrato nell'esempio di questo argomento.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>

trans-unit.source: You can use the RoleManagerEventHandler to replace the creation of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> object by the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> with your own custom object.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il RoleManagerEventHandler per sostituire la creazione del <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>con un oggetto personalizzato.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>

trans-unit.source: To do this, define a delegate using the RoleManagerEventHandler and assign it to the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.
trans-unit.target: A tale scopo, definire un delegato tramite il RoleManagerEventHandler e assegnare all' <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>evento di <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule>.</xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.RoleManagerModule.GetRoles>
